original_text: The priests agreed that they would not take any more money from the people. They agreed that they would not make repairs to the temple themselves.
korean_text: 제사장들이 다시는 백성에게 은을 받지도 아니하고 성전 파손한 것을 수리하지도 아니하기로 동의하니라

sentences.original_text: that they would not take any more money
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 더 이상 돈을 받지 않을 것이라고

sentences.original_text: that they would not make repairs
